alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pocahontas; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:08PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Randolph and Pocahontas Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 507 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Greenbank, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marlinton, Cass Scenic Railroad, Greenbank, Snowshoe, Durbin, Hillsboro, Dunmore, Arbovale, Cheat Bridge, Bartow, Cranberry Mountain Nature Center, Boyer, Edray and Buckeye. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pocahontas; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph
